ahasa usata maha dagab idikerini.lowamahapaya wani mahangi gruhanirmana shilpayan lowa mawitha karawana wari karmantha idiwiya.eeta awashya injineru shilpa gnyanaya labaganimata aarambha kala bauddha adhyapanaya hara wenath ka්ramayak thibune natha.mihindu himiyan apata labadun adhyapana ka්ramawedayan mangin gnyanaya wardhanaya kirima hadawatha nathinam gunadharma poshanaya hasuru kusalathawaya nohoth athapaya wehesawa nirmanashili lesa ki්rayakirima ketharam manawin siduwuweda yannata anuradhapura polonnaru yugawala bihi wu nirmana maha sakshiyak wanu atha.mihindu himiyan meratata dayada kala adhyapanaya mangin jathika washayen maha pibidimak athiwiya.nirawul chinthanayak athi kirima karunawa, dayawa, awankathwaya, samanathmathawaya, nirwyajathwaya, sarala bawa wani manawa gunangayan gen piripun nirogi shakthimath purawasiyan bihikaralima in manawin siduwiya.nuthana adhyapanawedin penwa dena paridi rataka sanwardhanayata adhyapanaya, sanskruthiya, deshapalanaya, aarthikaya ha janamadhyaya ek dishawakata gaman kala yuthuya.
ape unuth madak nosansun gathiyen dagalayi...

demala lamayinta karadarayakin thorawa pasal yamata pawa awakasha salasi thibuna.”“2009 manushika meheyuma awasanayata elambai mohothe samanya janathawata enna ida nothaba minis palihak lesa owun randawa gaththa. 2,97,000 k wani wishala janathawak rajaya ha hamudawa mangin beragath awasthawedith el ti ti ee bas ratha dekak minisun samanga pupuruwa harimin owunge mlechchathwaya pennum kala.palliyata awith karapu dewal da palliye pujaka thumek karana wistharayak da apa idiripath kara thibenawa.”“mewani amanushika kriyakarakam rasak el ti ti ee ya sidukara thibiyadith manawa ayithiwasikam gana katha karana ayata mewa nopenenne ayi kiya prashnayak mathu wenawa.parajayata path karannata bari yayi kiwu koti thrasthawadaya mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumage rajaya wisin parajayata pathkara thrasthawadaya me ratin thuran kara damuwe lokayama mawithayata path karamin.”

pawathina dhaneshwara yanthranaya ta wiruddha wa kadadahiya sayibar ida haraha karunumaya lesa balapamsahagatha paharadim sidukaramin aragalakari karyyabharayak sidukala minisunwa me yanthranaya wisin iwathkaralima janawari masa pamanak nowa sama masakadima nawatha nawatha apata mathak karawana karunaki. 2010 wasare janawari masa di paharagena thawamath kisidu sakshiyakwath nomathi madhyawedi pragith eknaligoda e් wagema 2006 janawari masaye di ghathanaya karana lada subramaniyam sugirdharajan hewath 2006 janawari masa 2 wanida thrikunamalaye di pasal sisun pasdenek ghathanaya kirima sadaha yudha hamudawe athi sambandhaya helidaraw kala “sudar oli” puwathpathe thrikunamalaye warthakaruge ghathanaya da janawariyedi siduwuwaki.
